project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to calculate mean for specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for specified columns
Write tests for the mean, median, and mode functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
